meanings.definition: Excessive sensitivity or responsiveness to stimuli.
meanings.sent1: Her oversensitivity to loud noises made it challenging for her to attend concerts.
meanings.sent2: His oversensitivity to criticism often led to misunderstandings with his colleagues.
meanings.sent3: The cat's oversensitivity to the vacuum cleaner resulted in hilarious acrobatics.
meanings.sent4: The oversensitivity of the alarm system made it trigger even at the slightest movement.
meanings.sent5: The oversensitivity of the microphone captured every whisper in the room.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being overly sensitive or easily offended.
meanings.sent1: The oversensitivity of the child caused them to cry at the smallest teasing.
meanings.sent2: She tried to avoid topics that might trigger her oversensitivity during family gatherings.
meanings.sent3: His oversensitivity to jokes made him the target of friendly banter.
meanings.sent4: The oversensitivity of the sensor made it detect even the gentlest touch.
meanings.sent5: The oversensitivity of the artist's emotions was reflected in their delicate paintings.
